name: Green Island
description:
A wonderful island, do you want to discover?

Green Island is a free enjoyable game for all ages.


Features:

• Drive/fly your beautiful car/plane around the island to enjoy the beach, mountain, sky, animals and so on.

• Hunt 8 kind of animals if you like.

• Motivate your skills with tasks and rewards every day.

• Achievements reward your talent.

• Enjoy your car/plane's journey in auto mode on a big screen even hours without boring.


Download the Green Island and discover it!


With any issues contact us at globalcyberventures@gmail.com or https://www.facebook.com/GreenIslandGCV
